Text:
Thanks a lot for the torrent!

Any other people willing to seed?

Um... Is anyone else having problems with this video? I've got all the latest codecs, I think, but it always seems to be completely gray with only some moving parts visible, and after a few seconds crashes the player, no matter which player it is?

This video works perfectly fine, posting comments like "this doesn't work for me" or "it crashes my media player" give people the wrong idea.  Learn how to use your computer, stop telling us how useless you are.
Looks good, sounds good. Thumbs up.
